T02D2929:332a-0: @332a * // a'arya badzra bi d'a ra na n'a ma aa bhi se ka bi dhi:/
T02D2929:332a-2: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya
T02D2929:332a-3: ba'i khrus kyi cho ga / dpal rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2929:332a-5: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dag dang /
T02D2929:332a-10: bram ze gang dag srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ma
T02D2929:332a-11: rgal ba dag la nad thams cad dang gdon dang
T02D2929:332a-12: / byad la sogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag la /
T02D2929:332a-13: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi cho
T02D2929:332a-14: gas grol bar gyur cig / de'i phyir de dag
T02D2929:332a-15: rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2929:332a-16: mdo 'di'i mtshan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi nges pa bstan te /
T02D2929:332a-18: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyi
T02D2929:332a-19: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas te
T02D2929:332a-20: / ye shes de ni bsod nams dang ye shes tshad med pa'i tshogs can /
T02D2929:332a-21: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i yon
T02D2929:332a-22: tan dang ldan pas de'i phyir lag na rdo rjes
T02D2929:332a-23: lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas zhes
T02D2929:332a-24: bya bas / 'byung ba chen po bzhi las grub
T02D2929:332a-25: pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi ye shes kyi
T02D2929:332a-27: de'i phyir rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya ba yang /
T02D2929:332a-28: ye shes de chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2929:332a-29: shin tu rtogs pa'i ngo bo rdo rje ltar thogs
T02D2929:332a-30: pa med pas / rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs la bya bar mngon no //
T02D2929:332a-31: ci'i phyir ye shes 'di la rdo rje zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2929:332a-32: phyi rol gyi rdo rje rin po che dang chos
T02D2929:332a-33: mthun pa rnam pa bdun yod pa'i phyir dpe'i sgo
T02D2929:332a-34: nas don nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
T02D2929:332a-41: thams cad du thogs pa med pa /
T02D2929:332a-42: thams cad du ma pham ba zhes bya ba rnams te /
T02D2929:332a-43: des ni ye shes de nyid kyi rang gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02D2929:332a-44: de nas gzhan gyi don bstan pa ni /
T02D2929:332a-45: thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sgo sna tshogs nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste /
T02D2929:332a-46: khams gsum pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba phyin ci log gi bsam pa can //
T02D2929:332b-0: phyi dang nang @332b nas bgegs dang log 'dren rnam
T02D2929:332b-1: par lta ba'i rgyu las kyi bag la nyal dang
T02D2929:332b-2: / kun nas ldang bar bcas pa de dag 'dul ba'i phyir /
T02D2929:332b-3: sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa //
T02D2929:332b-4: sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa zhes bya
T02D2929:332b-5: ba nas sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa
T02D2929:332b-6: / rmugs par byed pa'i zhas bya ba'i bar du tshig don bco lngas bstan te /
T02D2929:332b-7: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas gzhan gyi don mdzad par bstan te /
T02D2929:332b-8: zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod dang //
T02D2929:332b-9: dbang sogs las rnam bzhi po dag / thabs kyis 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02D2929:332b-10: ci rigs par ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D2929:332b-11: de ltar de dag ye shes kyi rdo rje des 'dul bar mdzad /
T02D2929:332b-13: 'joms par mdzad pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2929:332b-14: de nas gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag gsungs pa
T02D2929:332b-15: de dag kyang ye shes de'i rgyu las byung ba'i
T02D2929:332b-16: phyir thogs pa med pa rdo rje'i tshig tu rig
T02D2929:332b-17: par bya'o // de nas de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2929:332b-18: cho gar bya ba thams cad kyang gtso bor slob dpon la brten pa yin pas /
T02D2929:332b-19: de'i phyir slob dpon dang slob ma gnyis ka sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga ni /
T02D2929:332b-20: des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin //
T02D2929:332b-21: mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya //
T02D2929:332b-22: gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing //
T02D2929:332b-23: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2929:332b-24: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2929:332b-25: zhes bya ba la shin tu khrus bya ba dang gos gtsang ma gyon pa ni phyi'i gtsang sbra'o //
T02D2929:332b-26: sgo gsum nas sdig pa mi dge ba mi byed pa ni yid dge ba'o //
T02D2929:332b-27: byang chub tu smon pa ni sems dang ba ste de dag ni nang gi gtsang sbra'o //
T02D2929:332b-28: mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya //
T02D2929:332b-29: zhes pa'i don ni rig sngags de dag ye shes las byung bar khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2929:332b-30: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2929:332b-31: zhes bya ba yang ye shes de'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa nyid do //
T02D2929:332b-32: de nas slob dpon gyi cho gar bya ba ni
T02D2929:332b-33: mdo 'di nyid las dbang bskur ba'i yan lag tu
T02D2929:332b-34: bum pa bstan pa tsam du zad do //
T02D2929:332b-35: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho ga ma gsungs pa
T02D2929:332b-36: de dag 'di nyid du gsungs pa la mi mngon
T02D2929:332b-37: par 'gyur ba'am / yang na spyi rgyud las gsal
T02D2929:332b-38: ba'i phyir ram de dag tu ma bstan pa ni
T02D2929:332b-39: gnyis ka ltar na yang de ltar sbyar ba nyid
T02D2929:332b-40: par 'gyur ba'am / de / de las ni /
T02D2929:333a-1: lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa'am //
T02D2929:333a-2: lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am khang stong nags tshal du //
T02D2929:333a-3: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa gru bzhi'i tshad //
T02D2929:333a-4: tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri //
T02D2929:333a-5: phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su gzung //
T02D2929:333a-6: sgo bzhi'i sa la ku sha'i rtsva yang dgram //
T02D2929:333a-7: zhes gsungs pa las rig par bya'o //
T02D2929:333a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yang slob dpon gyis
T02D2929:333a-9: dang po sa bslang par bya ba dang sbyang ba
T02D2929:333a-10: la sogs pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin du byas pa
T02D2929:333a-11: ste / 'thas par bcags la ba'i rnam pa lnga
T02D2929:333a-12: dang sbos chu gtsang mas byug go / steng du
T02D2929:333a-13: yang bla re bre zhing dar gyi lnga ldi dang
T02D2929:333a-14: me tog gi phreng ba dang me long dag gis
T02D2929:333a-16: gzhan yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga la bkra shis
T02D2929:333a-17: kyi bum pa tshul dang ldan pas yon tan 'grub
T02D2929:333a-18: pa'i phyir / 'di nyid las de'i rgyu bstan pa ni /
T02D2929:333a-20: dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung //
T02D2929:333a-22: de dag gi nang dgang ba ni chu'o zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2929:333a-23: tsandan dang ga pur dang gur gum la sogs pa'i chus nang bkang la /
T02D2929:333a-24: de dang lhan cig dang ldan pa'i rin po che
T02D2929:333a-25: dang shel dang zhes bya ba ni dngos su zad
T02D2929:333a-26: do // nor bu zhes bya ba ni spyi tshig tu smos pa ste /
T02D2929:333a-27: rnam par phye na padma r'a ga dang aindra n'i
T02D2929:333a-28: la la sogs pa rin po che'i rigs su gtogs
T02D2929:333a-29: pa mu tig dang sa le sbram la sogs pa
T02D2929:333a-30: dag ste de dag kyang gas chag med pa rgyan
T02D2929:333a-31: gyi bya ba byed nus pa dag ni rma med
T02D2929:333a-32: ces bya'o // gzhan yang de'i zla la yungs kar dang /
T02D2929:333a-33: rtsva d'ur ba dang me tog rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2929:333a-34: tshul bzhin du spyi'i rgyud las kyang //
T02D2929:333a-35: bum pa padma dmar po'i mdog 'dra zhing //
T02D2929:333a-36: nag por ri med pa rin chen bcas //
T02D2929:333a-37: sman dang 'bru dang sbos chus bkang ba dag / ldum bus kha brgyan ras kyis mgul ba dkri //
T02D2929:333a-39: de dag gi ltor ni chu bre gang shong pa las bya bar bstan to //
T02D2929:333a-40: mtshan nyid gzhan ni rgyud gzhan dag las rig par bya'o //
T02D2929:333a-41: yang gong ma 'bru dang sman dang zhes bya ba la /
T02D2929:333a-42: bya kri dang seng kri la sogs pa'i sman rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2929:333a-43: til dang sran ma la sogs pa 'bru sna lnga rnams rgyud las grags pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D2929:333b-0: mgul chings ni gtsang ma'i gos zhes @333b bya ba
T02D2929:333b-1: ma spyad pa ma bab pa'i ras dkar po kha
T02D2929:333b-2: tshar ma nyams ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2929:333b-3: dkri zhing dgang ba ni gong du bstan pa'i rdzas rnams kyi don mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02D2929:333b-4: bum pa de ltar bca' ba de yang rtog pa
T02D2929:333b-5: gzhan gyi cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du grangs
T02D2929:333b-6: bzhi'am lnga dag gu gul la sogs pa la rdo
T02D2929:333b-7: rje khro bo'i sngags kyis btab ste bdugs la dbus
T02D2929:333b-8: dang grva bzhi ru gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2929:333b-9: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid las kyi khro bor
T02D2929:333b-10: bsgyur la lag tu rdo rje dang yungs kar blangs
T02D2929:333b-11: te / bskrad cing bsrung ba dang /
T02D2929:333b-12: mtshams bcad pa dag byas nas /
T02D2929:333b-13: thig skud lag tu blangs te phyogs ma 'khrul par bcad la rim pa gsum par thig gdab po //
T02D2929:333b-14: de nas lha'i ri mo bris te /
T02D2929:333b-15: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gtso bo phyag na rdo
T02D2929:333b-16: rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pa padma dang seng
T02D2929:333b-17: ge'i khri stengs su gzhag go //
T02D2929:333b-18: de'i grva bzhir 'khor rnams kyi phyag rgya byang shar
T02D2929:333b-19: mtshams nas bzung ste khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2929:333b-21: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02D2929:333b-22: be con rdo rjes mtshan pa dang /
T02D2929:333b-23: rdo rje tho ba rnams bri'o //
T02D2929:333b-24: de nas rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs par 'jig rten skyong pa bcu dang /
T02D2929:333b-25: bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad kyi mtshan ma dag bri'o //
T02D2929:333b-26: rim pa gsum par rin po che'i chun 'phyang dang /
T02D2929:333b-27: mu tig gi phreng ba dag dgod do //
T02D2929:333b-28: phyogs bzhir sgo khyud dang rta babs dag gis mdzes par bya'o //
T02D2929:333b-29: de'i phyi rol stegs bu'i mtha' skor du yang rtsva
T02D2929:333b-30: ku shas bskor cing me tog gi sil ma dag
T02D2929:333b-31: kyang bkram mo // de nas phyi rol du byung ste 'byung po rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir /
T02D2929:333b-32: bza' dang sha chang la phug la sogs bcas //
T02D2929:333b-33: 'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2929:333b-34: zhes bya ba dag khyer nas /
T02D2929:333b-35: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye 'grul //
T02D2929:333b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa'i bden pa bdar la /
T02D2929:333b-37: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba
T02D2929:333b-38: las kha phye ste bkan nas bstan pa'i tshul du
T02D2929:333b-39: byas pa ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste
T02D2929:333b-40: / 'byung po de dag la so so'i rig sngags
T02D2929:333b-41: dag brjod cing nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pas kyang
T02D2929:334a-0: de nas slar log ste lha'i gnas su song la tshon @334a * //
T02D2929:334a-1: gyi dkyil 'khor de dag mdun gyi nam mkha' la gyen du dpag cing /
T02D2929:334a-2: rin po che'i gzhal yas khang padma dang seng ge'i gdan khrir bcas pa bsams nas /
T02D2929:334a-3: der rigs kyi sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D2929:334a-4: spyan drang ba ni pho brang lcang lo can nas
T02D2929:334a-5: dpal phyag na rdo rje ye shes kyi khyad par
T02D2929:334a-6: las byung ba dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
T02D2929:334a-7: zhes bya ba sku mdog ljang sngon zhal gyi smin
T02D2929:334a-9: phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar bsnams pa /
T02D2929:334a-10: g-yon pa dkur brten cing 'gying ba /
T02D2929:334a-11: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang dar pa ti'am tshi gu gsol ba /
T02D2929:334a-12: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2929:334a-13: 'khor gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi khro bo dang /
T02D2929:334a-14: khro mo phyag brnyan grangs med pa'i tshogs can dag
T02D2929:334a-15: rang nyid kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs te
T02D2929:334a-16: / lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar
T02D2929:334a-17: la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug ste phan tshun
T02D2929:334a-18: bsnol ba'i rtse mo mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad
T02D2929:334a-20: gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste /
T02D2929:334a-21: bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas la
T02D2929:334a-22: mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gzhibs par bya'o
T02D2929:334a-24: aom badzra dzva la na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2929:334a-26: yang na rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo //
T02D2929:334a-27: de nas thog mar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te /
T02D2929:334a-28: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe
T02D2929:334a-29: bos mnan la lhag ma rnams rdo rje rtse gsum
T02D2929:334a-32: aom sham ka ra ma h'a sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2929:334a-34: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhir khro bo bzhi gzhag ste /
T02D2929:334a-35: byang shar mtshams nas bzung ste khro bo'i rgyal po
T02D2929:334a-36: rdo rje gtum po zhes bya ba mdog smug nag
T02D2929:334a-37: bzhin khro gnyer can phyag g-yas pa na khro bo'i
T02D2929:334a-38: rdo rje rtse lnga pa gdengs pa phyar te thogs
T02D2929:334a-39: par bsam mo // de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa
T02D2929:334a-40: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo snying ga'i logs su gzhag /
T02D2929:334a-41: g-yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje ltar byas te
T02D2929:334a-42: par bsam mo // / de'i sngags kyang 'di nyid las /
T02D2929:334a-43: aom tsu ru tsu ru tsanda badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2929:334a-44: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2929:334a-45: de nas shar lho'i mtshams su rdo rje k'i li
T02D2929:334b-0: k'i l'a ya zhes bya ba mdog ljang nag @334b
T02D2929:334b-2: phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje rtse gcig ba ka na ya'i dbyibs 'dra ba thogs pa bsam ste /
T02D2929:334b-3: de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2929:334b-4: mthe bong gnyis gyen du gzhibs la bsgreng ngo //
T02D2929:334b-6: aom tra sa ya tar sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2929:334b-7: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2929:334b-8: de nas lho nub kyi mtshams su rdo rje be
T02D2929:334b-9: con zhes bya ba mdog mthing nag sma ra ser
T02D2929:334b-10: po 'khyil pa / phyag g-yas na be con gyi rtse mo rdo rjes mtshan pa bsnams pa ste /
T02D2929:334b-11: de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis phyag 'tshal ba'i
T02D2929:334b-12: thal mo las mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ste tshigs bkug
T02D2929:334b-13: nas srin lag drung du gzugs par bya ste /
T02D2929:334b-15: aom ha ra ha ra badzra dha r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2929:334b-16: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2929:334b-17: de nas nub byang gi mtshams su rdo rje tho
T02D2929:334b-18: ba zhes bya ba mdog nag po shin tu khros
T02D2929:334b-19: pa mche ba gtsigs pa bsams te /
T02D2929:334b-20: de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs
T02D2929:334b-21: te mthe bong gnyis bsgreng mthe'u chung gnyis nang du
T02D2929:334b-23: aom pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra bha nydza n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2929:334b-24: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2929:334b-25: de nas phyi rol gyi rim pa gnyis par dbang
T02D2929:334b-26: bdag la sogs pa 'jig rten skyod pa bcu dang
T02D2929:334b-27: / rgyal ma la sogs pa bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya bsgom ste /
T02D2929:334b-28: de dag so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2929:334b-29: spyan drang zhing rang rang gi gnas su bkod la
T02D2929:334b-30: / gtso bo 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams la gus pa'i mchod pas khyab par bya ste /
T02D2929:334b-31: mchod yon byug sbos me tog bdug pa dang //
T02D2929:334b-32: zhal zas mar me'i tshogs rnams rim bzhin dbul//
T02D2929:334b-33: de nas phyogs bcu dag na ji ltar srid pa'i
T02D2929:334b-34: lha rdzas dag kun du bzang po'i mchod sprin dag
T02D2929:334b-35: gis mchod la / nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pas kyang byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2929:334b-37: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo bi shva mu khe bhya:/
T02D2929:334b-38: sarba tangkham aungga te sphar na hi mam ga gan kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2929:334b-39: de nas bstod pa ci shes pas kyang bstod do //
T02D2929:334b-40: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni //
T02D2929:334b-41: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
T02D2929:334b-42: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2929:334b-43: ces pa grangs ma nges par gsungs pa la rtsa
T02D2929:334b-44: ba'i rig sngags mjug snying po'i rig sngags rnam pa
T02D2929:335a-0: gnyis bskul tshig dang bcas par zlos pa ni @335a
T02D2929:335a-1: * // nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2929:335a-2: yang na de rnam pa gnyis ka gdon par mi nus na mjug na /
T02D2929:335a-3: na ma shtsanda badzra zhes bya ba nas aa mri
T02D2929:335a-4: te h'um phat ces bya ba'i bar ni rig sngags
T02D2929:335a-5: 'di'i snying po yin te bskul tshig dang bcas par
T02D2929:335a-6: lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya'o //
T02D2929:335a-7: de ltar bzlas brjod zin nas yon bdag gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2929:335a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su khri'u lta bu bzhag pa'i sar ri mo yid kyis bteg pa dang /
T02D2929:335a-9: yang na phyag rgya nyi tshe dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D2929:335a-10: de nas bum pa rnams kyi chu blugs shing dbang bskur te /
T02D2929:335a-11: shu ti dang nye shing la sogs pas khrus bya'o //
T02D2929:335a-12: rol mo dang bkra shis kyang gdon no //
T02D2929:335a-13: khrus zin nas sgor 'byung ba'i dus su zho dang
T02D2929:335a-14: sman dang 'bras la sogs pa bkra shis kyi rdzas
T02D2929:335a-15: la sogs pa cho gar bstan pa rnams mthong ba'am
T02D2929:335a-16: rig par bya ba dag ni bkag pa med do
T02D2929:335a-17: // de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i cho
T02D2929:335a-18: ga'i phan yon 'byung ba yang mdor bsdu na gnyis
T02D2929:335a-19: // te / sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa dang /
T02D2929:335a-20: bde ba skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D2929:335a-21: sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa ni /
T02D2929:335a-22: sems can dbang po nyams pa dang //
T02D2929:335a-23: tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang //
T02D2929:335a-25: de dag thams cad zhi bar lta //
T02D2929:335a-28: sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2929:335a-29: sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed //
T02D2929:335a-30: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad ba bzhis bstan to //
T02D2929:335a-31: bde ba skyed par byed pa ni //
T02D2929:335a-32: rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste //
T02D2929:335a-33: dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan //
T02D2929:335a-36: sdig ba kun las rnam par thar //
T02D2929:335a-37: zhes bya ba rnams kyis bstan to //
T02D2929:335a-38: de dag kyang phan yon mdor bsdus pa tsam du zad kyi /
T02D2929:335a-39: gzhan yang rgyal po'i chad pa dang /
T02D2929:335a-44: mtshon la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol bar rig par bya'o //
T02D2929:335a-45: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi
T02D2929:335a-46: cho ga / slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad
